MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:57pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6pm on 18th November 2020.
